body_html:
@LowBoonKeong Have you changed your build_all.bat in torch\lib? You have to build openblas with msys2/cygwin by yourself. And then copy the generated files into torch\lib\tmp_install. Finally, the build_all.bat in torch\lib should be modified.
The line

-DLAPACK_LIBRARIES="%INSTALL_DIR%/lib/mkl_rt.lib" -DLAPACK_FOUND=TRUE

should be replaced by this one

-DLAPACK_LIBRARIES="%INSTALL_DIR%/lib/libopenblas.lib" -DLAPACK_FOUND=TRUE

P.S. A orginal README for building with openblas
Update: For your error, just replace tools\shared\cwrap_common.py with torch\lib\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py.

The line

should be replaced by this one
-DLAPACK_LIBRARIES="%INSTALL_DIR%/lib/libopenblas.lib" -DLAPACK_FOUND=TRUE
P.S. A orginal README for building with openblas
Update: For your error, just replace tools\shared\cwrap_common.py with torch\lib\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py.
body:
@LowBoonKeong Have you changed your `build_all.bat` in `torch\lib`? You have to build openblas with msys2/cygwin by yourself. And then copy the generated files into `torch\lib\tmp_install`. Finally, the `build_all.bat` in `torch\lib` should be modified.
The line
```cmake
-DLAPACK_LIBRARIES="%INSTALL_DIR%/lib/mkl_rt.lib" -DLAPACK_FOUND=TRUE
```
should be replaced by this one
```cmake
-DLAPACK_LIBRARIES="%INSTALL_DIR%/lib/libopenblas.lib" -DLAPACK_FOUND=TRUE
```
P.S. A orginal [README](https://github.com/tylergenter/pytorch/blob/master/README_Windows.md) for building with openblas
Update: For your error, just replace `tools\shared\cwrap_common.py` with `torch\lib\ATen\common_with_cwrap.py`.
